Using Ripe

Source: vignettes/ripe.Rmd
ripe.Rmd
library(ripe)

replicate


stats::runif(20)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=2,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#>  [1] 0.56034319 0.43151371 0.04059336 0.96685538 0.64699587 0.30439747
#>  [7] 0.93217453 0.48808787 0.16107195 0.04735763 0.87063705 0.06595480
#> [13] 0.89818420 0.99685691 0.07255432 0.18373186 0.79491861 0.10956506
#> [19] 0.62302525 0.85682906
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>  [1] 0.92559038 0.14146383 0.67964012 0.95337672 0.97666546 0.94906959
#>  [7] 0.50946431 0.78510697 0.19358802 0.43327870 0.98458848 0.25584333
#> [13] 0.03458029 0.68092555 0.88359199 0.10927980 0.92852395 0.54689712
#> [19] 0.68445271 0.95719525

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=3,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#>  [1] 0.9626705 0.6545749 0.8920573 0.3651466 0.7533726 0.9847719 0.3801001
#>  [8] 0.3254653 0.7358521 0.6001213
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>  [1] 0.75340851 0.06298579 0.49955914 0.68434146 0.62059001 0.69869441
#>  [7] 0.63880871 0.35444293 0.65408727 0.32714897
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>  [1] 0.62435600 0.27335531 0.96972720 0.89963034 0.38186078 0.10234508
#>  [7] 0.39036918 0.63867613 0.35039265 0.05696794

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=4,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.7771086 0.4664388 0.7957799 0.6668745 0.6458742
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.2954669 0.5934970 0.2002282 0.9922166 0.5375855
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.9934910 0.7133439 0.2541011 0.8345936 0.7282004
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.3125902 0.6585300 0.5509748 0.5723887 0.2903339

apply

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(lapply, X=1:4)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.565924807 0.007915305 0.779745777 0.541300970 0.580066093
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.77707098 0.06057917 0.53619231 0.40066139 0.69876441
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.34518369 0.48660339 0.64606220 0.07575759 0.08878453
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.5835740 0.6720823 0.4674950 0.8307135 0.2416822

mclapply

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(
    parallel::mclapply,
    X=1:4,
    mc.cores = 2)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.72827737 0.53081424 0.08188805 0.24022063 0.30321013
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.4947443 0.6662966 0.6197731 0.1658124 0.5374367
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.94800572 0.01354448 0.13241054 0.01528316 0.66201055
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.5708006 0.8302646 0.1887846 0.5270661 0.3019030

purrr

iris %>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(5) %>% 
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=3)
#> [[1]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          5.7         2.8          4.1         1.3 versicolor
#> 2          5.4         3.7          1.5         0.2     setosa
#> 3          5.9         3.0          4.2         1.5 versicolor
#> 4          5.5         2.6          4.4         1.2 versicolor
#> 5          7.2         3.2          6.0         1.8  virginica
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width   Species
#> 1          5.8         2.8          5.1         2.4 virginica
#> 2          5.0         3.0          1.6         0.2    setosa
#> 3          4.8         3.0          1.4         0.1    setosa
#> 4          5.2         4.1          1.5         0.1    setosa
#> 5          4.6         3.1          1.5         0.2    setosa
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          5.9         3.0          5.1         1.8  virginica
#> 2          5.8         2.7          5.1         1.9  virginica
#> 3          4.7         3.2          1.3         0.2     setosa
#> 4          5.4         3.7          1.5         0.2     setosa
#> 5          5.7         2.6          3.5         1.0 versicolor

iris %>% 
  dplyr::select(1:2) %>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(20) %>% 
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=1)
#> [[1]]
#>    Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1           5.1         3.5
#> 2           6.9         3.1
#> 3           5.4         3.9
#> 4           6.7         2.5
#> 5           4.8         3.4
#> 6           4.9         3.1
#> 7           6.7         3.1
#> 8           5.7         4.4
#> 9           6.7         3.3
#> 10          5.9         3.2
#> 11          6.0         3.0
#> 12          6.2         2.9
#> 13          5.7         2.8
#> 14          6.5         3.0
#> 15          6.7         3.0
#> 16          5.5         4.2
#> 17          6.5         3.0
#> 18          5.0         3.2
#> 19          5.4         3.0
#> 20          5.0         3.4

iris %>% 
  dplyr::select(1:2)%>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(20) %>% 
  dplyr::slice(1:5) %>%
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=3)
#> [[1]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          6.3         2.9
#> 2          5.7         2.5
#> 3          5.8         2.7
#> 4          6.3         3.3
#> 5          5.0         3.5
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          4.8         3.1
#> 2          7.9         3.8
#> 3          7.2         3.0
#> 4          4.4         3.0
#> 5          6.0         3.4
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          6.3         2.3
#> 2          6.7         3.1
#> 3          4.4         2.9
#> 4          6.0         2.7
#> 5          4.7         3.2
